text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 107.1. Kiya tu nay(ussay bhi)dekha jo (roz) jaza ko jhutlata hai? 107.2. yehi who hai jo yateem ko dhakkay deta hai 107.3. Aur miskeen ko khilaney ki targeeb nahi deta 107.4. Un namazion kay liey afsos(aur well nami jahanum ki jagah)hai
